title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Bell 47J Ranger - Start the engine
description:
In this video we will have a look at how we can start the engine of the Bell 47J Ranger helicopter. In addition to this we will review how you can configure your controls to also use it for using it to control the engine power.

As final step we will try to go air born but as you will see you can see I need to practice a bit more.

00:00 intro
00:10 controlling the helicopter
02:44 changing the joystick assignments
03:38 starting the engine
13:18 trying to go air born
